definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: White meat, dark meat, you just can't lose.
sentences.chinese: 白肉，黑肉，对于你来说都是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: With strong cheeses, white and red meats .
sentences.chinese: 可搭配味浓的奶酪，白肉和红肉。

sentences.english: Gastronomic coupling: venison dishes, white meat dishes and all cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配家禽类菜肴，白肉和所有的奶酪。

sentences.english: Ideal with shellfish, fish, white meats in cream sauce and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 最宜与贝类，鱼肉，奶油白肉及禽类搭配。

sentences.english: Chicken sandwich, please. Just white meat only. And also black tea, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我鸡肉三明治，只要白肉的，再来一杯红茶。

sentences.english: It's delicately flavored white meat, very buttery," said the book.
sentences.chinese: 书中称，“这种鱼味道很好，属于细嫩多汁的白肉”。

sentences.english: One portion should be white fish, and one portion should be oily fish.
sentences.chinese: 一类应当为白肉鱼，另一份为多油脂的鱼。

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
non-vegetarian dish (including meat, fish, garlic, onion etc)
fat (e.g. pork fat)/fatty meat/(fig.) a gold mine/cash cow
